aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-5594-731 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 19/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 20/04/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 24/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 25/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 29/04/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Excessive vibration in control linkage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
